Details.Name: Entertainment
Details.Feature: Enjoy $1 off movie tickets at Shaw Theatres, and $26 movie package (U.P. $35.70) consisting of 2 regular movie tickets, 2 drinks and 1 popcorn
Buy 4 movie tickets for the price of 3 at Golden Village

Details.Name: Petrol
Details.Feature: Get up to 14% upfront discount at Esso and Caltex

Details.Name: Cash Back
Details.Feature: 1% cash rebate for monthly bills above S$1,000
0.5% cash rebate for monthly bills between S$500 and S$1,000
0.3% cash rebate for monthly bills S$500 and below

Details.Name: Dining
Details.Feature: Get discounts for dining including Timbre, House, Rakuichi Japanese Restaurant, The Disgruntled Chef, Peach Garden, Peony Jade, Red House Seafood Restaurant, and more

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver2 years fee waiver, subsequent years waived with min. spend $5,000 p.a.
